p: Food-grade sodium alginate (low viscosity; 160–200 mPa of 2% solution) and calcium chloride were purchased from Gemfont Corporation (Taipei, Taiwan). γ-Oryzanol and DPPH were purchased from Sigma Chemical Co. (St. Louis, MO, USA). Tween 80, Span 80, and other analytical grade chemicals used in this study were purchased from Chemical Co., Ltd. (Miaoli, Taiwan).
